title: 133: Love Is Blind Recap: Episode 2 (History’s Most Confusing Proposal ft. The Box)
itunes:title: 133: Love Is Blind Recap: Episode 2 (History’s Most Confusing Proposal ft. The Box)
description:
It’s time for the recap of LOVE IS BLIND episode 2, Broads, and to stay that The Broads are hooked on this show already is an UNDERSTATEMENT. They chat about numerous proposals, new faces and couples, meeting IRL for the first time, Barnett’s love triangle, Damien’s box proposal, Rory??, and much more.
**Love Is Blind Recap Episode 3: Coming Thursday March 26th 
INSTAGRAM:
